item.title: Day 3 - Hugo search with lunr and gulp
item.description:
Today I will apply javascript dynamic search into this blog using lunr.js - a library allow us to do that. This is base on a tutorial from Hugo official documentation - hugo + gruntjs + lunrjs = <3 search. However, I will modify it to use Gulp instead of Grunt, simply is that I love Gulp more than Grunt :))

Here is the detail:
